name: Visual Novel Maker - TeikokukaigunKoibojo Collection
detailed_description:
Warning

Note that the contents of this pack only may be used in projects as long as the following is true:

  • The material is used in non-commercial (free) games only.
  • The material is not used in any projects containing adult-only content.
  • The material is not used in any projects containing gore.
  • The material is not used in any projects that infringe upon copyright of any individual or company.
  • The material is used as-is, without any personal edits or modifications.


About the Game



Tumble down the winding roads of mystery and intrigue of early 20th century Japan in this exciting new collection of characters and backgrounds!

During the Russo-Japanese War taking place at Yokosuka, a rookie special intelligence agent is paired with one of five dashing members of the "Navy Band" and she must risk her life - and heart! - to complete her mission. This is the world of 「TeikokukaigunKoibojo」 , a bitter love visual novel published by D3 Publisher. Now you can bring the universe of 「TeikokukaigunKoibojo」to life in your non-commercial VNM projects! Whether you wish to create an homage to an intriguing romance or simply want a new setting for your project, you can't go wrong with「TeikokukaigunKoibojo」Collection!

This collection includes backgrounds for early 20th century Japan cityscapes, as well as backgrounds for the home of the heroine and some of her companions. Characters include 5 male spies from Navy Band, as well as 10 supporting characters. The five male spies come with blinking eyes and mouth animation patterns to help you create engaging and animated scenes.

This collection contains:

■Characters■

[Gunrakutai]

※ Includes 11 expressions for each character and 4 clothing options.
・Fukayama（深山 峻晴）・Hiratsuka（平塚 茂）・Iyobe（伊予部 直哉）・Hara（原 正毅）・Komiyama（小宮山 嵩元）

A（Uniform A）
B（Uniform B）
C（Casual C）
D（Casual D）

[Sub Characters]

※ Includes 11 expressions for each character.
・Tokuda（徳田 剛昌）・Fujisawa（藤沢 浩成）・Numajiri（沼尻 かのこ）・Honjo（本庄 眞一郎）・Mihagi（美萩 保徳）・Soeda（添田 秋生）・Siga（志賀 京）・Fukayamabro（深山 稜照）・Tazaki（田崎 好弘）・Mironov（ウラジミール・ミロノフ）

〇About animation patterns
※Most expressions have 2-4 patterns, as named below:
[Talking with eyes open]
・Idle expression「openeyetaiki」
・Talking Expression「openeyekaiwa」
[Talking with eyes closed]
・Idle Expression「closeeyetaiki」
・Talking Expression「closeeyekaiwa」

■Backgrounds■



The following backgrounds are included:

[Barracks]
Barracks Outside（Morning, Evening, Night）
Barracks Office（Morning, Evening, Night）
Barracks Hallway（Morning, Evening, Night）
Barracks Play Ground（Morning, Evening, Night）
Barracks Training Grounds（Morning, Evening, Night）
Barracks Material room
Barrack sPrison

[Home]
Heroine Home Outside（Morning, Evening, Night）
Heroine Home Living（Morning, Evening, Night）
Heroine room（Morning, Evening, Night）
Hara s Home（Morning, Evening, Night）
Siga s Home（Morning, Night）

[Others]
Port（Morning, Evening, Night）
Yokosuka City（Morning, Evening, Night）
Foreign Settlement（Morning, Evening, Night）
Commercial Building Garden（商館の庭）
Backstreet（Morning, Evening, Night）
Avenue（Morning, Evening, Night）
Bar（Morning, Night）
Parlour（Morning, Evening, Night）
Church
Cooking Hut
Yukaku Outside（Morning, Evening, Night）
Yukaku Hallway
Yukaku Tatamiroom
Geisha House
Hideout 01（Morning, Evening, Night）
Hideout 02
Clinic（Morning, Evening, Night）
Sickroom
Partyroom
Inboard
Sky（Morning, Evening, Night）

※This content use is subject to the Collaboration Collection resource EULA, please check before use.
